{"id":1514099764,"question_id":2685,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1737339271,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"232 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1514099764/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"First Completely Painted Row or Column","memory":"203.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int firstCompleteIndex(vector<int>& arr, vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        int m = mat.size();\n        int n = mat[0].size();\n        //Return the smallest index i at which either a row or a column will be completely painted in mat.\n        unordered_map<int, int> mpr, mpc;\n        unordered_map<int, int> mprc, mpcc;\n        for(int i=0; i<m; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {\n                mpr[mat[i][j]] = i;\n                mpc[mat[i][j]] = j;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0; i<arr.size(); i++) {\n            int num = arr[i];\n            mprc[mpr[num]]++;\n            mpcc[mpc[num]]++;\n            if(mprc[mpr[num]]==n || mpcc[mpc[num]] == m)\n                return i;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"first-completely-painted-row-or-column","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
